name: Chick's Tale
overview: Chicks' Tale is a card game with hentai scenes. Player-controlled character competes against four young girls. The rules of the game are rather simple: each player is dealt ten cards. Following clockwise turns, each player has either to play a card that has a higher value than the previous one, or pass. Winning a hand allows the player to begin the next turn with the card of his/her choice. It is also possible to play several cards of the same value at once. Whoever has played all the ten cards first wins the round. After three rounds, a cut-scene follows, during which the defeated character shares sexual experiences from her life, presented as sexually explicit images with text. Afterwards, the card game is resumed.
